mapper.select: SELECT om.order_code as orderCode, g.g_name as goodsName, om.final_price as finalPrice, oss.order_status_standard_details as orderStatusStandardDetails, om.order_group_code AS orderGroupCode, d.delivery_enter AS deliveryEnter, d.delivery_num AS deliveryNum FROM tb_order_management AS om INNER join tb_order_detail AS od on od.order_group_code = om.order_group_code INNER join tb_goods AS g on g.g_code = od.g_code INNER Join tb_order_status AS os on g.g_code = os.g_code INNER join tb_order_status_standard AS oss on oss.order_status_standard_code = os.order_status_standard_code INNER Join tb_delivery AS d on d.order_detail_code = od.order_detail_code WHERE od.member_id = 'id002' ORDER BY os.order_status_update_datetime;
